attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The new facelifted Honda Amaze. The All New Honda Amaze Comfort model features a new 7''touchscreen infotainment system with Android Auto and Apple CarPlay. For added convenience the new infotainment system incorporates a reverse parking camera on the comfort model, while rear park distance control is now a standard feature. Upgraded new interior to black. A brand new front grille, new 15" diamond-cut alloy wheels and LED Front Fog Lights. Legendary fuel efficiency on the renowned 1.2 liter engine. Come see for yourself the great build quality and reliability.
This vehicle includes a factory warranty of 5 year / 200000km, 2 year /30000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.
Book your test drive today!

Finance available to all approved buyers, Tarde in's Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252552. PRICE REDUCED!!!
Balance of 3year unlimited Warranty and Service plan available.

Vehicle comes with accessories worth R70 000 fitted onto the bakkie such as canopy, nudge bar, tow bar, side steps, dash cam to name a few. Apart from being much more handsomely styled than its predecessor, the new BT-50 offers appreciably more appeal for buyers who want the practicality and looks of a bakkie, but ultimately utilise their vehicles as family cars. A 4-door pick-up will never be able to match the sophistication of a unibody SUV, but Mazda’s newcomer demonstrates that “leisure double-cab” standards are rising rapidly.

We deliver country wide, inhouse financing available.
The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Call us today to arrange a test drive. Errors and omissions Reserved.
T&Cs apply
